posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Sung to the tune of Monty Python's the Philospher Song.

Maximillian_Kane is a real pain
Who's builds are very rarely able.

Mick Dagger, Mick Dagger is a stabbyy beggar
Who could shank you under the table.

Grizzled_Dwarflord can out-build
Mithdrates and HipMaestro.

And Stagmeister is an uninspired swine
Who is just as untalented as Goshozal.

There's nothing Eltalstro can teach you
'Bout the making of a build,
Mithdrates, himself, has absolutely no skill.

Findaruil, of his own free will,
On the making of a build is particularly ill.

HipMaestro, they say, will sit and bray,
Half a playing guide every day.

TyrTemplar, TyrTemplar his builds are real bizarre,
And Orion doesn't give a damn.

And Mithdrates builds are not Art,
"I build, therefore I am."

Yes, Yunim himself is particularly miffed,
A lovely little builder, but a bugger when his build's dismissed.
